basic.floral_language:
Mammillaria elongata
Floriography: lovely, warm-hearted, strong
Is a Cereus, grows in a cluster, thick and fleshy covered by golden yellow thorns, but thorns are long and scattered. Easy to grow, often placed on a desk, coffee table, in bedrooms or offices.
Likes sunny places, has a summer dormant period, need put under bright scattered light. With the right conditions blooms with pale yellow flowers.
basic.blooming: Succulent plants, sometimes flowers, light yellow flowers
basic.color: Leaf color green, covered by thin soft yellow spines

maintenance.soil: Peat and akadama mixed in 3:1 ratio
maintenance.sunlight: Likes light, a short period of dormancy in summer and winter , put in places with bright scattered light
maintenance.watering: Resistant to drought, water thoroughly when soil is dry, reduce water in summer and winter
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions,  apply once monthly in spring and autumn
maintenance.pruning: Remove dead and rotten part timely
